levels.title: What is Graphic Design?
levels.description: An introduction to the field and its role in communication.

levels.title: The 7 Elements of Design
levels.description: Learn about Line, Shape, Form, Texture, Pattern, Color, and Space.

levels.title: The 7 Principles of Design
levels.description: Understand Balance, Contrast, Emphasis, Movement, Pattern, Rhythm, and Unity.

levels.title: Introduction to Color Theory
levels.description: Learn about the color wheel, hue, saturation, and value.

levels.title: Color Harmonies
levels.description: Understand complementary, analogous, and triadic color schemes.

levels.title: Introduction to Typography
levels.description: Learn the art and technique of arranging type.

levels.title: Serif vs. Sans-Serif Fonts
levels.description: Understand the fundamental difference and use cases for each.

levels.title: Kerning, Tracking, and Leading
levels.description: Learn the basics of spacing letters and lines of text.

levels.title: Introduction to Layout and Composition
levels.description: Learn how to arrange elements on a page.

levels.title: The Rule of Thirds
levels.description: A simple but powerful composition technique.

levels.title: Visual Hierarchy
levels.description: Guide the viewer's eye through your design.

levels.title: Introduction to Adobe Illustrator
levels.description: Learn the basics of the industry-standard vector graphics editor.

levels.title: The Pen Tool in Illustrator
levels.description: Master the most powerful and fundamental tool in Illustrator.

levels.title: Creating Basic Shapes in Illustrator
levels.description: Learn to use the shape tools and Pathfinder panel.

levels.title: Introduction to Adobe Photoshop
levels.description: Learn the basics of the industry-standard raster graphics editor.

levels.title: Photoshop Layers and Masks
levels.description: Understand non-destructive editing in Photoshop.

levels.title: Vector vs. Raster Graphics
levels.description: Learn the key difference and when to use each.

levels.title: Image File Formats (JPG, PNG, SVG)
levels.description: Understand the difference and best use cases for each format.

levels.title: The Design Process
levels.description: Learn the typical workflow: Brief, Research, Sketch, Design, Refine.

levels.title: Creating a Mood Board
levels.description: Gather inspiration and define the visual direction for a project.

levels.title: Sketching for Ideas
levels.description: Learn why sketching is a crucial first step in design.

levels.title: The Grid System in Design
levels.description: Use grids to create organized and harmonious layouts.

levels.title: Alignment Principles
levels.description: Create a clean and organized look by aligning your elements.

levels.title: Proximity and Grouping
levels.description: Group related items together to create visual units.

levels.title: Repetition in Design
levels.description: Create consistency and unity by repeating visual elements.

levels.title: The Psychology of Color
levels.description: Understand how different colors evoke different emotions.

levels.title: CMYK vs. RGB Color Modes
levels.description: Learn the difference between print and screen color modes.

levels.title: Font Pairing
levels.description: Learn the art of combining different typefaces effectively.

levels.title: Introduction to Adobe InDesign
levels.description: Learn the basics of the layout and page design software.

levels.title: Working with Text Frames in InDesign
levels.description: Manage and format large blocks of text.

levels.title: Illustrator's Live Paint Tool
levels.description: Easily color your vector illustrations.

levels.title: Photoshop Adjustment Layers
levels.description: Make non-destructive color and tonal adjustments.

levels.title: Photoshop Selection Tools
levels.description: Learn to isolate parts of an image with Marquee, Lasso, and Magic Wand.

levels.title: What is a Logo?
levels.description: Understand the purpose and types of logos.

levels.title: What is Branding?
levels.description: Learn that a brand is more than just a logo.

levels.title: Introduction to Icon Design
levels.description: Learn the principles of creating simple, effective icons.

levels.title: Negative Space in Design
levels.description: Understand the importance of what isn't there.

levels.title: Giving and Receiving Design Critique
levels.description: Learn how to talk about design effectively.

levels.title: Finding Quality Stock Photos
levels.description: Learn about Unsplash, Pexels, and other resources.

levels.title: Design Ethics and Copyright
levels.description: Understand the basics of using other people's work.

levels.title: Introduction to UI Design
levels.description: The basics of designing user interfaces for apps and websites.

levels.title: Introduction to UX Design
levels.description: The basics of designing the user experience.

levels.title: Introduction to Figma
levels.description: Learn the basics of the popular collaborative UI design tool.

levels.title: Creating Frames and Layouts in Figma
levels.description: Structure your designs in Figma.

levels.title: The Shape Tools in Figma
levels.description: Create vector shapes and icons directly in Figma.

levels.title: Contrast and Readability
levels.description: Ensure your designs are accessible and easy to read.

levels.title: History of Graphic Design: Bauhaus
levels.description: Learn about the influential German art school.

levels.title: History of Graphic Design: Swiss Style
levels.description: Understand the principles of the International Typographic Style.

levels.title: Creating a Simple Style Guide
levels.description: Define the colors, fonts, and logo usage for a brand.

levels.title: File Management and Organization
levels.description: A crucial skill for professional designers.

levels.title: Creating a Behance Profile
levels.description: Start building your online design portfolio.

levels.title: Understanding a Design Brief
levels.description: Learn to extract key information from a client brief.

levels.title: Textures in Design
levels.description: Add depth and tactility to your work.

levels.title: Symmetry and Asymmetry in Layout
levels.description: Create balance in your compositions.

levels.title: Golden Ratio
levels.description: A mathematical ratio found in nature, often used to create pleasing compositions.

levels.title: Choosing a Font for a Project
levels.description: Learn a process for selecting appropriate typography.

levels.title: Illustrator's Stroke and Fill
levels.description: Master the basic attributes of vector shapes.

levels.title: Photoshop's Healing Brush and Clone Stamp
levels.description: Retouch and repair images.

levels.title: Preparing Files for Print (Bleed, Trim)
levels.description: Learn the basics of print production.

levels.title: Creating a Simple Pattern
levels.description: Design a repeating pattern in Illustrator.

levels.title: Exporting Assets for Web
levels.description: Save your designs in the correct format and size for web use.

levels.title: Introduction to Infographic Design
levels.description: Visualize data and information effectively.

levels.title: Poster Design Basics
levels.description: Learn the key elements of a successful poster.

levels.title: Social Media Graphic Design
levels.description: Design posts for platforms like Instagram and Facebook.

levels.title: Basic Photo Composition
levels.description: Learn rules like leading lines and framing.

levels.title: Creating Animated GIFs in Photoshop
levels.description: Make simple frame-by-frame animations.

levels.title: Introduction to Presentation Design
levels.description: Design clear and effective slides.

levels.title: The Power of White Space
levels.description: Understand how 'empty' space can improve your designs.

levels.title: Finding Design Inspiration
levels.description: Learn where to look for inspiration without copying.

levels.title: Project: Design a Business Card
levels.description: Create a business card for a fictional company.

levels.title: Project: Design a Social Media Post
levels.description: Create a promotional graphic for a product.

levels.title: Project: Create a Personal Logo
levels.description: Design a monogram or logomark for yourself.

levels.title: Project: Recreate a Simple Poster
levels.description: Practice your layout and typography skills by recreating a design.

levels.title: Final Project: Design a Flyer
levels.description: Design a one-page flyer for a local event.

levels.title: Advanced Typography: Typographic Scales
levels.description: Create harmonious type systems using established scales.

levels.title: Advanced Typography: Grids for Text
levels.description: Use baseline grids to align your text perfectly.

levels.title: Grid Systems Deep Dive
levels.description: Explore modular, columnar, and hierarchical grids.

levels.title: Logo Design Process
levels.description: A deep dive into the process of creating a professional logo.

levels.title: Brand Identity Design
levels.description: Develop a complete visual identity system for a brand.

levels.title: Packaging Design
levels.description: Learn the fundamentals of designing for 3D surfaces.

levels.title: Editorial Design and Layout
levels.description: Design layouts for magazines, books, and reports.

levels.title: UI Design: Component-Based Design
levels.description: Design reusable components for user interfaces.

levels.title: UI Design: Design Systems
levels.description: Create a single source of truth for a product's design.

levels.title: Figma: Auto Layout
levels.description: Create dynamic designs that respond to their content.

levels.title: Figma: Components and Variants
levels.description: Build powerful, reusable components in Figma.

levels.title: UX: User Personas and Journey Mapping
levels.description: Understand your users and their experience with your product.

levels.title: UX: Wireframing and Prototyping
levels.description: Create low and high-fidelity prototypes of your designs.

levels.title: Information Architecture
levels.description: Organize and structure content in an effective way.

levels.title: Accessibility in Design (WCAG)
levels.description: Design for users with disabilities.

levels.title: Advanced Illustrator: Gradient Mesh
levels.description: Create complex, photorealistic vector illustrations.

levels.title: Advanced Illustrator: Blends and Brushes
levels.description: Create custom brushes and complex vector effects.

levels.title: Advanced Photoshop: Compositing
levels.description: Combine multiple images into a seamless whole.

levels.title: Advanced Photoshop: Smart Objects
levels.description: Work non-destructively with raster and vector layers.

levels.title: Motion Graphics with Adobe After Effects
levels.description: An introduction to animating graphics over time.

levels.title: After Effects: Keyframes and Easing
levels.description: Control the timing and feel of your animations.

levels.title: Data Visualization and Infographics
levels.description: Tell compelling stories with data.

levels.title: Isometrics and 3D in Illustrator
levels.description: Create 3D effects and isometric illustrations.

levels.title: Print Production Deep Dive
levels.description: Understand color profiles, spot colors, and print finishes.

levels.title: Freelancing for Designers
levels.description: Learn the basics of finding clients and managing projects.

levels.title: Building a Design Portfolio
levels.description: Create a professional portfolio to showcase your best work.

levels.title: Writing a Design Case Study
levels.description: Effectively communicate the process and results of your projects.

levels.title: Design Thinking Methodology
levels.description: A human-centered approach to problem-solving.

levels.title: Working with Design Sprints
levels.description: Rapidly solve big challenges through prototyping and testing.

levels.title: Generative Art and Creative Coding
levels.description: An introduction to creating art with code (p5.js).

levels.title: Web Design with HTML and CSS
levels.description: Learn the code behind web design.

levels.title: Introduction to Webflow
levels.description: Build professional websites without writing code.

levels.title: Designing for Mobile vs. Desktop
levels.description: Understand the key differences and constraints.

levels.title: Iconography: Creating an Icon Set
levels.description: Design a cohesive set of icons.

levels.title: Character Illustration
levels.description: Learn the basics of designing characters.

levels.title: Environmental Graphic Design
levels.description: Design for physical spaces (wayfinding, signage).

levels.title: Presentation Design Deep Dive
levels.description: Design compelling and professional slide decks.

levels.title: Art Direction
levels.description: Guide the overall visual style and mood of a project.

levels.title: Working with a Creative Brief
levels.description: Understand and respond to a client's needs.

levels.title: Pricing Your Design Work
levels.description: Learn different models for pricing your services.

levels.title: Design Contracts and Agreements
levels.description: Protect yourself and your work with a solid contract.

levels.title: Advanced Color Theory
levels.description: Explore color models like LAB and HSB.

levels.title: Lettering and Custom Typography
levels.description: Draw your own custom letterforms.

levels.title: User Testing for Designers
levels.description: Get feedback on your designs from real users.

levels.title: Figma Plugins for Productivity
levels.description: Supercharge your workflow with Figma plugins.

levels.title: Illustrator Scripts and Actions
levels.description: Automate repetitive tasks in Illustrator.

levels.title: Photoshop Actions and Batch Processing
levels.description: Automate edits on multiple images.

levels.title: Introduction to 3D with Blender
levels.description: Learn the basics of 3D modeling and rendering.

levels.title: Design for Augmented Reality (AR)
levels.description: An introduction to designing for AR experiences.

levels.title: Design for Virtual Reality (VR)
levels.description: An introduction to designing for VR environments.

levels.title: The Business of Design
levels.description: Understand how design creates business value.

levels.title: Creative Project Management
levels.description: Manage design projects from start to finish.

levels.title: Digital Painting in Photoshop
levels.description: Learn the basics of painting with a graphics tablet.

levels.title: Photo Manipulation and Compositing
levels.description: Create surreal and imaginative images.

levels.title: Advanced Animation Principles
levels.description: Learn about squash and stretch, anticipation, and follow-through.

levels.title: Explainer Video Creation
levels.description: Combine graphics, animation, and voiceover to explain a concept.

levels.title: Book Cover Design
levels.description: Learn the art of designing compelling book covers.

levels.title: Poster Design Deep Dive
levels.description: Explore different styles and techniques for poster design.

levels.title: Project: Design a Brand Identity
levels.description: Create a logo, color palette, and typography for a fictional brand.

levels.title: Project: UI/UX for a Mobile App
levels.description: Design the key screens for a mobile application.

levels.title: Project: Design a Magazine Spread
levels.description: Create a multi-page layout in InDesign.

levels.title: Project: Animate a Logo
levels.description: Bring a static logo to life with a short animation in After Effects.

levels.title: Final Project: Portfolio Website Design
levels.description: Design and build a complete portfolio website to showcase your work.

levels.title: Design Leadership and Management
levels.description: Learn how to lead and grow a design team.

levels.title: Building and Scaling Design Systems
levels.description: Manage a large-scale design system for a product team.

levels.title: Design Ops
levels.description: Orchestrate and optimize the people, processes, and craft of design.

levels.title: Strategic Design
levels.description: Use design to solve complex business and social problems.

levels.title: Service Design
levels.description: Design the end-to-end experience of a service.

levels.title: Ethical Design and Dark Patterns
levels.description: Understand and avoid deceptive design practices.

levels.title: Inclusive Design
levels.description: Design products that are usable by people with a wide range of abilities.

levels.title: Typeface Design
levels.description: Learn the process of creating your own font.

levels.title: Advanced 3D Modeling and Texturing
levels.description: Create complex models and realistic materials in Blender or Cinema 4D.

levels.title: Procedural Graphics with Houdini
levels.description: An introduction to node-based procedural generation.

levels.title: Advanced Motion Graphics
levels.description: Explore character rigging, particle systems, and expressions in After Effects.

levels.title: Shader Programming for Designers
levels.description: Write code to create custom visual effects for 2D and 3D graphics.

levels.title: AI in the Design Process
levels.description: Leverage AI tools for inspiration, asset generation, and more.

levels.title: Generative AI for Image Creation
levels.description: Master tools like Midjourney and Stable Diffusion.

levels.title: Running a Design Agency
levels.description: The business side of starting and running your own studio.

levels.title: Product Design Strategy
levels.description: Align product design with business goals and user needs.

levels.title: Quantitative and Qualitative UX Research
levels.description: Conduct in-depth user research to inform your designs.

levels.title: Design for Behavior Change
levels.description: Use design to influence user habits and behaviors.

levels.title: Speculative and Critical Design
levels.description: Use design to explore possible futures and ask critical questions.

levels.title: Teaching and Mentoring in Design
levels.description: Share your knowledge and help grow the next generation of designers.

levels.title: Public Speaking for Designers
levels.description: Present your work and ideas confidently at conferences and meetups.

levels.title: Writing about Design
levels.description: Contribute to the design discourse by writing articles and blog posts.

levels.title: Advanced Prototyping (Framer/Principle)
levels.description: Create high-fidelity, interactive prototypes with code and advanced tools.

levels.title: Design for Emerging Technologies (Voice, Haptics)
levels.description: Explore designing for non-visual interfaces.

levels.title: Computational Design
levels.description: Use algorithms to generate and optimize design solutions.

levels.title: Design for Sustainability
levels.description: Consider the environmental impact of your design choices.

levels.title: Cross-Cultural Design
levels.description: Design products that are effective in different cultural contexts.

levels.title: The History and Future of Design
levels.description: A deep dive into the evolution of the design field.

levels.title: Design Curation
levels.description: The art of selecting and presenting design work.

levels.title: Working with Developers
levels.description: Master the designer-developer handoff process.

levels.title: Design Token Strategy
levels.description: Create a scalable system for managing design decisions as data.

levels.title: Advanced Data Visualization
levels.description: Design complex, interactive dashboards and data narratives.

levels.title: Custom Illustration Systems
levels.description: Develop a unique and cohesive illustration style for a brand.

levels.title: Wayfinding and Signage Systems
levels.description: Design large-scale navigation systems for physical spaces.

levels.title: Exhibition Design
levels.description: Design the layout and experience of a museum or gallery exhibition.

levels.title: Book Design Deep Dive
levels.description: The art of typography, layout, and production for books.

levels.title: Retail and Merchandising Design
levels.description: Design for in-store experiences and product displays.

levels.title: Creative Direction
levels.description: Develop and lead the creative vision for a campaign or brand.

levels.title: The Psychology of Design
levels.description: Understand cognitive biases and how they influence user perception.

levels.title: Advanced Animation and Rigging
levels.description: Create complex character animations.

levels.title: VFX and Compositing for Motion Designers
levels.description: Integrate live-action footage with motion graphics.

levels.title: Design for Social Impact
levels.description: Use your design skills to address social and environmental challenges.

levels.title: Developing a Unique Design Voice
levels.description: Cultivate a personal style that sets you apart.

levels.title: Intellectual Property for Designers
levels.description: A deep dive into copyright, trademarks, and licensing.

levels.title: Pitching and Winning High-Value Clients
levels.description: Learn the art of the proposal and presentation.

levels.title: The Business of Creativity
levels.description: Balance creative pursuits with financial sustainability.

levels.title: Final Project: Launch a Brand
levels.description: Create a complete brand identity and strategy for a new company.

levels.title: Final Project: Design and Prototype a Complex App
levels.description: Create a full-featured prototype and design system for a new application.

levels.title: Final Project: Direct a Short Animated Film
levels.description: Develop a concept, storyboard, and animate a short film.

levels.title: HCI (Human-Computer Interaction) Principles
levels.description: Explore the academic foundations of interaction design.

levels.title: Variable Fonts
levels.description: A deep dive into the technology and creative possibilities of variable fonts.

levels.title: Augmented Reality (AR) Prototyping
levels.description: Use tools like Adobe Aero to create AR experiences.

levels.title: Sound Design for Motion Graphics
levels.description: Learn how sound can enhance your animations.

levels.title: Design Futures and Trend Forecasting
levels.description: Analyze trends to anticipate the future of design.

levels.title: Managing Client Relationships
levels.description: Build long-term, successful relationships with clients.

levels.title: Design Facilitation and Workshops
levels.description: Lead collaborative design workshops with stakeholders.

levels.title: Gamification and Game Design Principles
levels.description: Apply game mechanics to non-game products.

levels.title: The Semiotics of Design
levels.description: Understand how signs and symbols create meaning.

levels.title: Designing for Voice User Interfaces (VUI)
levels.description: Create intuitive experiences for voice assistants.

levels.title: Biometric Data in Design
levels.description: Explore the use of eye-tracking and other biometric data in UX research.

levels.title: The Philosophy of Design
levels.description: Explore the deeper 'why' behind design decisions and movements.

levels.title: Multi-sensory Design
levels.description: Design experiences that engage multiple senses.

levels.title: Design for AI Products
levels.description: The unique challenges of designing interfaces for AI-powered products.

levels.title: Design Leadership at Scale
levels.description: Lead design in a large, complex organization.

levels.title: Contributing to the Design Community
levels.description: Organize meetups, mentor others, and contribute to open source design.

levels.title: Capstone: Design a Social Impact Project
levels.description: Use design thinking to tackle a major social problem.

levels.title: Web GL for Interactive Experiences
levels.description: An introduction to creating high-performance 3D graphics on the web.

levels.title: Color Management for Professionals
levels.description: Ensure color consistency across all media.

levels.title: The Art of the Pitch Deck
levels.description: Design presentations that win funding and influence decisions.

levels.title: Retail and Experiential Design
levels.description: Design immersive brand experiences in physical spaces.

levels.title: Designing for Wearables
levels.description: The unique constraints and opportunities of designing for smartwatches and other wearables.

levels.title: Cognitive Psychology for Designers
levels.description: A deeper dive into how the human mind perceives and processes information.

levels.title: Patent and Trademark Law for Designers
levels.description: Learn how to protect your creative work legally.

levels.title: Mock Interview: Portfolio Review
levels.description: Get your portfolio reviewed by a senior designer.

levels.title: Mock Interview: Whiteboard Challenge
levels.description: Practice solving a design problem live.

levels.title: Capstone: Publish a Design Case Study
levels.description: Write and publish a professional case study on a platform like Medium or UX Collective.

levels.title: Capstone: Create and Launch a Design System
levels.description: Build a comprehensive design system from scratch.

levels.title: Capstone: Curate a Design Exhibition
levels.description: Develop a concept and plan for a physical or digital design exhibition.
